title: AEI Student Chapter Fund
description: To provide support for the AEI Student Chapter at CU Boulder.  Support includes refreshments for speaker presentations, site tours of energy efficient and sustainable buildings, and travel expense for upcoming student design competitions.
marketingContent: The AEI student chapter at CU Boulder is the preeminent student organization dedicated to understanding and advancing the state of the art of architecture, engineering, and construction (AEC) profession through networking, design competitions, and giving back to the AEC Community.
